fields.name: AllowNetworkPluginKubenet
fields.description: Running in Kubenet is disabled by default due to the security related nature of AAD Pod Identity and the risks of IP spoofing. See [using Kubenet network plugin with AAD Pod Identity](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/aks/use-azure-ad-pod-identity#using-kubenet-network-plugin-with-azure-active-directory-pod-managed-identities) for more information.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Whether the pod identity addon is enabled.

fields.name: UserAssignedIdentities
fields.description: The pod identities to use in the cluster.

fields.name: UserAssignedIdentityExceptions
fields.description: The pod identity exceptions to allow.
